## Variables

`speaker`

:   Speaker's ID.

`file`

:   Audio chunk file name.

`label`

:   SAMPA label.

`release`

:   Time of C1 release within the recording.

`voi_obset`

:   Onset time of vocal fold vibration relative to the C1 release.

`consonant`

:   IPA consonant.
